name: Time Oriented Report
query:
select pa.patient as "PATIENT NO:100", pa.patient_name as "PATIENT NAME:100", pa.creation as "APPOINTMENT CREATED:150", 
vs.creation as "VITALS CREATED:100", vs.modified as "VITALS SUBMITTED:100", 
min(ver.modified) as "FIRTS TIME DOCTOR ATTENDS A PATIENT:70",  max(ver.modified)  as "LAST TIME DOCTOR TOUCHES THE ENCOUNTER:70", 
npc.creation as "PATIENT TAKES HIS/HER CARD:70"
from `tabPatient Appointment`pa  inner join `tabVital Signs` vs on pa.name = vs.appointment
inner join `tabPatient Encounter` pe on pe.appointment = pa.name
inner join `tabVersion` ver on pe.name = ver.docname  
left join `tabNHIF Patient Claim` npc on pe.appointment = npc.patient_appointment
group by pa.creation order by pa.creation;


/*
select pa.name as "APPOINTMENT NO:100", pa.patient as "PATIENT NO:100", pa.patient_name as "PATIENT NAME:100", 
pa.creation as "APPOINTMENT CREATED:150", vs.creation as "VITALS CREATED:150", vs.modified as "VITALS SUBMITTED:150",
min(ver.creation) as "FIRTS TIME DOCTOR ATTENDS A PATIENT:70", max(ver.creation) as "LAST TIME DOCTOR TOUCHES THE ENCOUNTER:70"
from `tabPatient Appointment`pa, `tabVital Signs` vs, `tabPatient Encounter` pe, `tabVersion` ver
where   pa.name = vs.appointment
and     pa.creation between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s
and     pa.name = pe.appointment
and     pe.creation between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s
and     pe.name=ver.docname
and     ver.creation between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s
and     pe.modified_by = ver.owner
group by pa.name
order by pa.creation asc;




where   pa.creation between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s
and     pe.creation between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s
and     ver.creation between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s
or     npc.creation between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s
*/

roles.role: Insurance Head and NHIF Patient Claim
